--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Cliffjumper nodded, "We may as well check it out, I have a strange
> feeling." he mentioned. "Torca, come with me, the rest of you, 
rest."
> Cliffjumper tranfsormed, and roared off at his top speed, 
accelerating
> to 250mph towards the fiery shape, hoping Torca was following him 
for
> backup.

::REDHOT::

    Redhot watched Cliffjumper and Torca run off.
    "I wish..I could go..with them" he said. "But I fear..I am 
**NOT**...in the best..shape." He smiled at Firedrill, Beachcomber and 
Klant. "If you..do..not mind..I will sleep again."
    In a matter of momments, the seeker had found a hollow in the 
ground to curl up in. It wasn't the most comfortable thing and he 
tried to avoid ants (the pesky little things!), but it suited his 
needs. Seconds later his soft 'snores', actually quiet audable clicks, 
filled the air.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
